name: Civic Engagement
description: With the Chinese American population accounting for nearly twenty percent of San Francisco and well over two-thirds of that being immigrants, educating and organizing Chinese immigrants to build electoral power for social justice is a critical task. CPA has plays in active role in local, statewide, and national alliances to increase the civic engagement of working and immigrant families.
